snippet: Silver ritual objects with Anglo-Jewish provenance from London collections have been consigned to auction in Manhattan.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; silver ritual objects with Anglo-Jewish provenance from London collections are been consigned to auction in Manhattan; dollhouse collection exhibit is showing at the Gunn Memorial Library & Museum in Washington, Conn; Holiday Express show of toy trains is at the New-York-Historical Society.
lead_paragraph: Silver ritual objects with Anglo-Jewish provenance from London collections have been consigned to auction in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Judaica From Tuck Collection in London to Be Auctioned
headline.main: Judaica From Tuck Collection in London to Be Auctioned
headline.print_headline: Rare British Judaica To Be Sold in New York
